parameters.name: GlobalIgName
parameters.description:
The name of the IP address whitelist template. The name must meet the following requirements:

- It must consist of lowercase letters, digits, and underscores (\_).

- It must start with a letter and end with a letter or a digit.

- It must be 2 to 120 characters in length.

parameters.name: GlobalSecurityGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the IP address whitelist template.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~61933~~) operation to query the latest list of regions.
